meta.title: Build Kanban board UI with drag-and-drop

task.role: You are a Senior Frontend Engineer with expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern UI/UX. Implement Task 16 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create interactive Kanban board for task management with drag-and-drop functionality
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Install react-beautiful-dnd for drag-and-drop 2. Create KanbanBoard component with columns for todo/in-progress/done 3. Implement TaskCard component with task details and actions 4. Add drag-and-drop handlers for task status updates 5. Integrate with task API endpoints for real-time updates 6. Add task filtering and search functionality 7. Implement optimistic UI updates with error handling

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-16): Build Kanban board UI with drag-and-drop

acceptance_criteria.criterion: E2E tests for drag-and-drop functionality and integration tests with task API
